The proposal to raise the service charge has drawn a mixed response from netizens .
One woman , called Jessie Chen , said NT $ 500 is relatively inexpensive compared to the fees at other airports around the world .
Another netizen , named Joy Tsai , wrote that the Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport was the least deserving of a fee increase .
